Plot: A small-town father must find the courage and conviction to share his son's extraordinary, life-changing experience with the world.
Title: Heaven Is for Real
Writer: Randall Wallace (screenplay), Chris Parker (screenplay), Todd Burpo (book), Lynn Vincent (book)
Actors: Greg Kinnear, Kelly Reilly, Thomas Haden Church, Connor Corum
tomatoConsensus: Heaven Is for Real boasts a well-written screenplay and a talented cast, but overextends itself with heavy-handed sequences depicting concepts it could have trusted the audience to take on faith.
